should_extract_materia.label: Should Extract Materia
should_extract_materia.tooltip: Has had minimal testing, but will extract materia during the idle state if possible.

max_mobs_to_fight.label: Max Mobs to Fight
max_mobs_to_fight.tooltip: Max number of mobs to fight at one time, the bot will try to pull mobs until this number is reached. 0 = infinite.
